page.title: 04INTRODUCTION
page.content: Housing is well maintained and gardens are neat and tidy. There are very few local authority built houses _ the largest estate being Stock Mead-. Farms in the district are not large and do not provide employment for many people.Farm machinery is cheaper than labour.Sources of employment in the district include the Mushroom Farm, which employs many partime people, the Veterinary College, a branch of Bristol University and Meat Research Institute, and a small industrial estate at Langford. In Churchill there seem to be more elderly people than young families and teenagers. Most people tend to be very friendly and helpful, always ready to contribute to the events in and around Churchill.
